name: SimonClothoBattle
_source: s;Clotho;So close, Simon. But you will not take one more step.|I have woven it so.
s;Simon;Have you?{w} Did you also "weave" my destruction of your temple?
s;Simon;You can't truly control mortals' lives, can you?|It's an impressive bluff.
s;Clotho;It is hardly a bluff when you are all so eager to believe it.|Especially when those who challenge us are so quick to go to their graves.
